sentences.english: 0ne place where you find lots of backseat drivers is in politics.
sentences.chinese: 要說指手畫腳的人，在政界你可以找到好多。

sentences.english: Chiang jumped into politics after deciding to be a civil rights attorney.
sentences.chinese: 成爲民權法律師後，江步入了政界。

sentences.english: The stubborn delusions of the political elite provide the second reason.
sentences.chinese: 第二個原因則是政界精英頑固的妄想。

sentences.english: Some politicians in America are showing their support for Mr Ma.
sentences.chinese: 美國一些政界人士表達了他們對於馬英九的支持。

sentences.english: Milton had devoted nineteen years to the world of politics.
sentences.chinese: 彌爾頓19年都活躍在政界。

sentences.english: The intellectual and political trends favoring deregulation were not limited to the United States.
sentences.chinese: 知識界和政界支持放鬆監管的趨勢並不侷限於美國。

sentences.english: He entered politics when he was 27.
People in political circles and business circles spend much time on clothing, they have good manners.
sentences.chinese: 政界和工商界人士普遍衣飾講究，言行舉止規矩大方。

sentences.english: I think it helps all of us as politicians.
sentences.chinese: 這對於我們政界的人來說很有益處。

sentences.english: The turmoil at the Chambishi mine quickly bled into Zambian politics.
sentences.chinese: 昌比希銅礦的騷亂很快蔓延至贊比亞政界。

sentences.english: Consumption is down. The political world is focused on deficits and austerity.
sentences.chinese: 儲蓄率上升，消費下降，政界關注赤字與緊縮。

sentences.english: Is this just the media's latest honeymoon with a new pair of political stars?
sentences.chinese: 這只是媒體對一對政界新星的又一個“蜜月期”嗎？

sentences.english: Do not get involved with politics. That'sborrowing trouble.
sentences.chinese: 不要涉足政界，那簡直是自找麻煩。

sentences.english: His boss was rather influential in the government circles.
sentences.chinese: 他的老闆在政界還是頗有影響的。

sentences.english: Mr. Smith is a warhorse in politics.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯先生是位政界老手。

sentences.english: Those are the big questions in UK politics.
sentences.chinese: 這些問題是英國政界的重大問題。
